title: "Pulling out of the War on Christmas.”  (Holiday mailbag episode!)
description: Donald Trump's government shutdown doesn’t stop Jon F. and Dan from answering listener questions in this special holiday mailbag edition of the pod. Then Katie Porter joins Jon to talk about turning California’s 45th district blue and the work waiting for her once she’s sworn in to Congress.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
